csgo.title: Counter Strike
csgo.short: The most loved games of all times- challenge your friends to win the tournament and challenge your rivals to earn the title!

debate.title: Debate
debate.short: Wanna  showcase your oratory skills?! Have the will to prove your point?! We've got just the right platform for you! Come register your team and get your thinking hats on!

fifa.title: FIFA
fifa.short: Everyone loves a good football match! Why not control everyone in it and play it your way?! Consoles are always exciting! We have the perfect opportunity for you to get your game face on and play away to victory! Play FIFA on the ever-exciting PS4 and challenge your opponents to win the tournament.

filmaking.title: Through the Mini Lens
filmaking.short: A necessity- Smartphone. A hobby- Videography. We're pooling it together and giving you the chance to showcase your awesome skills using your own phones! Make a 'short' movie using your phone and show us your creativity to win exciting prizes!

hackathon.title: Mini Hackathon
hackathon.short: Too many cooks may spoil the broth! But too many coders surely can develop awesomeness! Get ready to bring in your best team and code your way to win! Face this challenge and drive your team to success!

pubgmobile.title: PUBG Mobile
pubgmobile.short: Everyone you see, is glued to their smartphones these days because of one and only one reason- PUBG! Everyone you ask has heard or played this game- PUBG! So why not play to win in reality?! Come participate in an actual battle and fight your opponents to prove that you're the best!

technovators.title: Technovators
technovators.short: It takes great courage and free spirit to quit everything and build up your own empire to work on your own terms. Let's applaud the ones who successfully established their own and discover their innovations in this gathering.

techtalk.title: TECHtalk
techtalk.short: Everyone's a techie in some way or the other. Be it smartphones or being hooked on to games or even just 'Googling' stuff. So come join us for an amazing talk by well-known intelligentsia and tickle your brain-cells!

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.short: Always wanted to get your hands on to something you only every saw on the internet or television?! Here's your chance! Join us for exciting workshops and build your way to happiness!
